newsitem.title: MAURITIUS: Mauritian premier appoints new finance minister.
newsitem.headline: Mauritian premier appoints new finance minister.

text.p: Mauritian Prime Minister Navin Ramgoolam announced he had appointed a new finance minister in a minor reshuffle of his cabinet.
Vasant Bunwaree, a cardiologist, replaces Rundheersing Bheenick, who resigned in August over a questionable transfer of government funds involving the central Bank of Mauritius.
Ramgoolam announced the changes late on Wednesday. Several ministers changed their posts in the reshuffle.
